name: Orange Cucumber Salad
recipeCategory: easy, lunch, quick, salads and dressings
keywords: cucumber, red onion, seedless orange, raw
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons red onion, reserved from pasta sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Peel oranges, and cut section in half and separate.
Wash, trim and thinly slice the cucumber; mince the onion.
Whisk vinegar, orange juice and olive oil in bowl. Chop mint; add with oranges and cucumbers. Mix well.
